    • Wardrobe

      public Wardrobe(float Width, float Depth, float Height, String Color, int SectionsNum, boolean hasMirror, boolean isSliding)
      Basic constructor creating a wardrobe
      Parameters:
      Width - wardrobe width (cm)
      Depth - wardrobe depth (cm)
      Height - wardrobe height (cm)
      Color - wardrobe color
      SectionsNum - number of sections in the wardrobe
      hasMirror - is there a mirror in this wardrobe?
      isSliding - is it a sliding wardrobe?
      See Also:
      • Wardrobe()
